parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system in cold weather can cause difficulty in turning the vehicle, making it harder to control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Difficulty turning the vehicle in cold weather
power steering becomes operative after the engine warms up.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering rack and pinion can cause loss of steering control, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: grinding or clunking noise from the steering system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine failure can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
Failure of the front vibration damper can cause vibrations and noise, leading to reduced vehicle performance and potentially causing damage to other engine components.
Failure of the motor mounts can cause the engine to shift or fall, leading to a loss of steering ability and increasing the risk of accidents.
Failure of the timing belt and gear can cause engine damage, leading to costly repairs and potentially causing the vehicle to stall or lose power.
The failure of the driveshaft can cause the vehicle to lunge or lose control, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: the vehicle loses power or control
the vehicle makes a loud noise or vibration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to lose power or control, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: the transmission makes a loud noise or vibration
the vehicle loses power or acceleration
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.
